import React, { useState } from "react"; import { MonsterType } from "../../mock/MockMonsters"; import "./Monster.css"; const Monster = (props: MonsterType) => { const [damageTaken, setDamageTaken] = useState(0); const updateDamage = (e: any) => { setDamageTaken(e.target.value); }; return (

{props.name}

HP
{props.hp}
AC
{props.ac}
Speed
{props.speed}ft
STR
{props.stats ? props.stats.str : 0}
DEX
{props.stats ? props.stats.dex : 0}
CON
{props.stats ? props.stats.con : 0}
INT
{props.stats ? props.stats.int : 0}
WIS
{props.stats ? props.stats.wis : 0}
CHA
{props.stats ? props.stats.cha : 0}
); }; export default Monster;
